name: Beam AI
summary: An enterprise-grade agentic process automation platform that deploys autonomous agents to streamline workflows across industries like healthcare, finance, and customer service.

case_studies.title: Avi Medical – Healthcare Inquiry Automation
case_studies.summary: Avi Medical reduced patient response times and lowered handling cost by 93% by automating routine inquiries with Beam AI agents.

case_studies.title: Martech Firm – Contact Processor
case_studies.summary: Beam AI’s Contact Agent Processor automated natural-language email updates across multiple systems, eliminating manual delays and cognitive load for customer success teams.

case_studies.title: Quotation Generation Agent
case_studies.summary: An agent intelligently managed the quotation lifecycle—identifying products and model numbers accurately, eliminating manual cross-reference errors.

name: n8n
summary: An open-source visual automation and workflow tool that supports integration with AI services to build flexible automation flows.

case_studies.title: Vodafone – Threat Intelligence Automation
case_studies.summary: Vodafone used n8n to revolutionize threat intelligence workflows, saving £2.2 million.

case_studies.title: Stepstone – Mission-Critical Workflows
case_studies.summary: Stepstone runs over 200 workflows with n8n, speeding integration of data sources by 25x.

case_studies.title: Supply Chain AI Agent Use Case
case_studies.summary: An AI agent was built in n8n to automate warehouse order processing via email parsing, enabling supply chain analytics automation.

name: MiniMax Agent
summary: A high-capability autonomous AI assistant that can generate code, design, multimedia content, and deploy complex workflows from simple natural-language prompts.

case_studies.title: Netflix Clone in Minutes
case_studies.summary: Users reported MiniMax Agent generated a working Netflix-style streaming application from a single prompt using approximately 356 credits.

name: Pydantic AI
summary: A Python developer-focused framework for building production-grade AI agents using typed data models including validation, async support, and tool integration.

case_studies.title: RAG Knowledge-Base Agent
case_studies.summary: Using Pydantic AI, developers built a reliable retrieval-augmented generation agent with minimized hallucinations and strong type-safe design.

name: Agentforce (Einstein)
summary: Salesforce’s enterprise AI agent platform embedded within its CRM ecosystem, providing autonomous agents that can analyze data, generate content, and execute actions with governance.

case_studies.title: SDR Outreach Automation
case_studies.summary: An SDR Agent triggered by lead engagement automatically handled outreach workflows, improving efficiency in sales development.

case_studies.title: Einstein Sales Coach
case_studies.summary: Embedded within opportunity layouts, the AI coach allowed sales reps to role-play and receive reviews of sales conversations.

name: LangGraph
summary: A graph-based orchestration framework built on LangChain for building complex, agentic AI workflows.

case_studies.title: Definely legal assistant
case_studies.summary: Definely used LangGraph to design a multi-agent system to help lawyers speed up workflows.

name: Napkin AI
summary: A visual-generation AI tool that turns business text into diagrams and infographics instantly.

case_studies.title: Design cost reduction
case_studies.summary: User reported replacing a graphic design company, lowering design costs by 94% and reducing turnaround time to near zero.

name: MGX (MetaGPT X)
summary: A no-code multi-agent ‘AI Dev Team’ that builds and deploys apps, websites, dashboards and tools from natural-language prompts.

case_studies.title: Web app generation
case_studies.summary: Users can chat to build and deploy websites, blogs, dashboards, tools in any language without coding.

name: Microsoft AutoGen
summary: An enterprise-grade open-source framework for building scalable, multi-agent, event-driven AI workflows (with optional no-code Studio).

case_studies.title: Retail agent system
case_studies.summary: A Medium case describes building a retail AI agent system with AutoGen to enhance customer engagement.

name: CrewAI
summary: An intuitive multi-agent collaboration framework with role-based agents, rich integrations, and flexible deployment options.

case_studies.title: Gelato fulfillment automation
case_studies.summary: CrewAI plugged into Gelato Connect to automate heavy data-mapping and integration work, speeding up time-to-business.
